name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Rust Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in building secure, high-performance applications within complex systems. Proficient in **Rust** programming, emphasizing secure system design and concurrent system architecture. Experienced in applying cryptography, asynchronous programming, and developing decentralized systems. Accomplished in integrating Web3 technologies, including **OAuth**, **OpenID**, and implementing **Decentralized Identity (DID)** and **Verifiable Credentials (VCs)**. 

Skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in frontend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, alongside backend frameworks including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated ability to deliver AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics, real-time processing, and automation. Proficient in cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD methodologies.

Strong adherence to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, coupled with a robust background in MLOps using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
